thread.section_title: Alpha Flight Guru Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Alpha Flight Guru | alphaflightguru.com
thread.title: Brendon
thread.title_full: Alpha Flight Guru reviewed by Brendon

author: Brendon
title: Brendon
text: I have been dealing with Adele and have so far booked 2 separate trips (one international and one domestic) through her (although I am yet to fly). On both occasions Adele has been very easy and friendly to work with. I also spoke to 2 of her previous clients (before we actually engaged) and they spoke very highly of her too! So far so very good!
